# GitKraken.dev Documentation

> GitKraken.dev is the web platform for GitKraken—providing license management, team organization, Git provider integrations, Launchpad (a daily Git dashboard), Workspaces, Cloud Patches, Code Suggest, and Insights (engineering metrics). This documentation covers account setup, subscriptions, SSO, security, automations, and more.

## Getting Started

- [GitKraken.dev Home](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-home/): Overview of core features including Launchpad, Cloud Patches, Workspaces, and Code Suggest.
- [Manage Your GitKraken Account](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-account/): Create and manage your GitKraken account, login options (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Azure DevOps, Google, Microsoft, email, SSO), profile personalization, and account deletion.
- [GitKraken Trials](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-trials/): Two trial types—14-day individual trial and 30-day business trial with team features.
- [Connect GitHub, GitLab, Azure Integrations](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-integrations/): Connect cloud and self-hosted Git providers (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Azure DevOps) for Launchpad, Workspaces, and Cloud Patches.

## Subscription & Billing

- [Manage GitKraken Subscription and Billing](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-subscription/): Purchase, add seats, cancel, reactivate, update billing method, and download invoices.
- [GitKraken Accounts and Licenses FAQ](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-faq/): Common questions on trials, license keys, multi-device use, subscription expiry, invoices, and payment options.
- [GitKraken Student Pack](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-student-pack/): 6-month free Pro trial for verified GitHub Student Developer Pack members.
- [GitKraken Reseller Guide](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-reseller/): Reseller instructions for purchasing subscriptions, transferring ownership, and generating quotes.

## Organization & Team Management

- [Manage GitKraken Organizations](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-organization/): Roles (Owner, Admin, User, Lead, Billing Contact), adding/inviting users, CSV import/export, teams, license reallocation, and ownership transfer.
- [Configure Single Sign-On (SSO)](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-single-sign-on/): SAML 2.0 SSO setup with domain verification and IdP examples for G Suite, Azure AD, Okta, and Ping Identity.

## Insights & Analytics

- [Getting Started with GitKraken Insights](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-insights/): Connect data sources (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket), import repositories, and optionally link an AI provider.
- [Dashboard Management in GitKraken Insights](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-dashboard-management/): Create dashboards with DORA metrics, PR metrics, AI Impact, Code Quality, and Velocity. Customize layouts, trendlines, and filters.

## Automation & Workflows

- [Automations](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-automations/): Rule-based automations for pull requests and issues (Pro+). Set conditions and actions, manage saved automations by repository.

## Security

- [Security Information for GitKraken.dev](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-security/): Data collection, TLS encryption in transit, AES-256 encryption at rest (MongoDB Atlas, Postgres, S3), and SOC2 certification.
- [Security Controls & Cloud Patch Configuration](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-security-controls/): Manage AI feature access org-wide, enforce AI providers, and self-host Cloud Patches with AWS S3.

## Policies

- [GitKraken Cloud Services Support Terms and Conditions](https://help.gitkraken.com/gk-dev/gk-dev-terms-and-conditions/): Support hours, response time SLAs by plan, support periods, and end-of-life processes.
